ai.summary: An easy 1.8 km section (spur) of the Irwell Sculpture Trail in the UK. This short, family-friendly route features riverside paths with public art and a gentle gradient, ideal for a relaxed outdoor stroll.
ai.terrain_summary: Mostly flat, well-maintained paths along riverbank and parkland. Expect a mix of tarmac, gravel, and some boardwalk sections with occasional gentle gradients.
ai.safety_notes: This is a short, easy route, but stay on marked paths and be mindful of cyclists on shared sections. Check the weather before you go, wear sturdy footwear, and supervise children near water. Respect private property and art installations; dogs should be kept on a short leash where required.
recommended_gear: Mobile phone with a map or offline details
ai.best_seasons: Spring to autumn are ideal for comfortable temperatures and clearer paths; the route can be walked year-round, but conditions may be less pleasant in winter.

seo.title: Irwell Sculpture Trail (Spur) — Easy 1.8 km UK Walk
seo.meta_description: Discover the Irwell Sculpture Trail spur: an easy 1.8 km stroll along riverside paths with public art. Practical tips, gear, and best season guidance for a pleasant hike.
